body_html: Why would you want to pass gradients of different sizes like that? They generally break our invariants and are not guaranteed to even produce correct results if you try to pass them to other builtin autograd functions.
body_text: Why would you want to pass gradients of different sizes like that? They generally break our invariants and are not guaranteed to even produce correct results if you try to pass them to other builtin autograd functions.
body: Why would you want to pass gradients of different sizes like that? They generally break our invariants and are not guaranteed to even produce correct results if you try to pass them to other builtin autograd functions.
